metadata.name: Gaze
metadata.description:
He had endured a difficult start to his life, abandoned by his previous owners when he was just a puppy. Left for himself, he faced the harsh realities of the world with uncertainty and fear. 

One day, when he was wandering through the streets, his tired eyes met those of a kind-hearted human who had a gentle spirit and a deep love for animals. The human approached him with caution, extending a hand of compassion. 

Having experienced neglect and abandonment, the old dog was hesitant at first. He gazed the human cautiously, studying his every move, and taking his time to understand his intentions. The human, aware of the dog's lack of trust, patiently sat on the ground, maintaining a respectful distance, and allowing the dog to approach at his own pace. 

Slowly, the old dog began to realize that the human was different. His gestures were genuine, his heart sincere. With a leap of faith, the old dog cautiously stepped forward, with the hope of finding a safe home.
